subject: Math
title: The Quadratic Formula
description: Use the quadratic formula to solve any quadratic equation

content.text: The quadratic formula can solve ANY quadratic equation, even when factoring is difficult or impossible. It's one of the most important formulas in mathematics!

content.heading: The Quadratic Formula
content.text:
For ax² + bx + c = 0:

x = (-b ± √(b² - 4ac)) / (2a)

The expression b² - 4ac is called the discriminant.

content.heading: The Discriminant
content.text:
b² - 4ac tells us about the solutions:
• If > 0: two real solutions
• If = 0: one real solution
• If < 0: no real solutions (two complex)

content.heading: Example 1
content.problem: Solve x² - 5x + 6 = 0 using the quadratic formula
